participant_1.background:
I am in my high school band.
I really enjoy making friends.
I want to be a movie director when i grow up.
I play the trumpet.
My dad and i own over 600 movies.

participant_2.background:
My favorite season is spring.
I enjoy walks on the beach.
I am a graphic designer.
I am currently single.
I love to paint.

content.text: Hi! My name is participant_1.
Hi! My name is participant_2.
It's nice to meet you. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks on the beach, paint, and I'm a graphic designer.
That's cool! I play the trumpet in my high school band and I want to be a movie director when I grow up.
Wow! That's awesome. I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument. What kind of movies do you want to direct?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm really interested in action and adventure movies.
Those are my favorite too! I love watching movies where the characters have to overcome obstacles and challenges.
Me too! I think it's really inspiring to see how people can overcome adversity.
I agree. It's also really fun to watch the characters learn and grow.
Yeah, that's a big part of what makes movies so good.
So, what are some of your favorite movies?
I really like the Lord of the Rings movies, the Harry Potter movies, and the Pirates of the Caribbean movies.
Those are all great movies! I love the Lord of the Rings movies too.
Me too! They're so epic and they have such a great story.
I agree. I also love the special effects in the movies.
Yeah, they're amazing.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, play video games, and watch movies.
Those sound like fun things to do. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play action and adventure games, like Call of Duty and Grand Theft Auto.
Those are some of my favorite games too!
Me too! They're so much fun to play.
So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the movies or hang out with my friends.
Those sound like good options. If you go to the movies, you should check out the new Star Wars movie.
I've been wanting to see that movie! I'll definitely check it out.
Cool! I hope you enjoy it.
Thanks! I think I will.
